title: Labour MP suspended over allegations of sexually harassing a female party member
text:
Labour MP Stephen Hepburn has been suspended by his party after a complaint of sexual harassment.

It has been alleged that the MP cornered a young female party member in a curry house in 2005 and tried to join her in a taxi as she was leaving.

The 59-year-old was first investigated over the incident two years ago, but the case was dropped.

Now, according to HuffPost, fresh evidence has emerged in the form of a statement written by an MP who claims to have been present at the restaurant.

In it, the MP is reported to have said: “During the course of the meal, Stephen made laddish ‘banter’ and the atmosphere was rather awkward.”
description: Labour MP Stephen Hepburn has been suspended by his party after a complaint of sexual harassment.
